languages.text: "Маршал, вы повинны только в собственной доверчивости и негибкости. Не вижу причин наказывать вас".
"Marshal, all you are guilty of is being gullible and rigid in your ways. I see no reason to condemn you."
languages.original_text: "Маршал, вы повинны только в собственной доверчивости и негибкости. Не вижу причин наказывать вас".

traits.locale_text: "Marshal, all you are guilty of is being gullible and rigid in your ways. I see no reason to condemn you."
"Marshal, all you are guilty of is being gullible and rigid in your ways. I see no reason to condemn you."
"Marshal, all you are guilty of is being gullible and rigid in your ways. I see no reason to condemn you."
"Marshal, all you are guilty of is being gullible and rigid in your ways. I see no reason to condemn you."
"Marshal, all you are guilty of is being gullible and rigid in your ways. I see no reason to condemn you."
"Marshal, all you are guilty of is being gullible and rigid in your ways. I see no reason to condemn you."

languages.text: "Marschall, Eure einzige Schuld ist Eure Gutgläubigkeit. Ich sehe keinen Grund, Euch zu verdammen."
languages.original_text: "Marshal, all you are guilty of is being gullible and rigid in your ways. I see no reason to condemn you."

traits.locale_text: "Marschall, Eure einzige Schuld ist Eure Gutgläubigkeit. Ich sehe keinen Grund, Euch zu verdammen."

languages.text: « Maréchal, la seule chose dont vous êtes coupable, c'est d'être crédule et trop rigide. Je ne vois aucune raison de vous condamner. »
languages.original_text: "Marshal, all you are guilty of is being gullible and rigid in your ways. I see no reason to condemn you."

traits.locale_text: « Maréchal, la seule chose dont vous êtes coupable, c'est d'être crédule et trop rigide. Je ne vois aucune raison de vous condamner. »

languages.text: “元帅，你唯一的罪过就是太容易上当受骗，做事也太过死板。我没有理由定你的罪。”
languages.original_text: "Marshal, all you are guilty of is being gullible and rigid in your ways. I see no reason to condemn you."

traits.locale_text: “元帅，你唯一的罪过就是太容易上当受骗，做事也太过死板。我没有理由定你的罪。”

languages.text: «Mariscal, solo es culpable de ser crédulo e inflexible. No veo razones para condenarlo».
languages.original_text: "Marshal, all you are guilty of is being gullible and rigid in your ways. I see no reason to condemn you."

traits.locale_text: «Mariscal, solo es culpable de ser crédulo e inflexible. No veo razones para condenarlo».

languages.text: 「将帥、君の罪は騙されやすく、自分のやり方に固執していることだけだ。君を非難する理由はない」
languages.original_text: "Marshal, all you are guilty of is being gullible and rigid in your ways. I see no reason to condemn you."

traits.locale_text: 「将帥、君の罪は騙されやすく、自分のやり方に固執していることだけだ。君を非難する理由はない」

languages.text: "Miralay, senin tek suçun saf olman ve yöntemlerinde katı davranmak. Seni kınamak için geçerli bir sebep göremiyorum."
languages.original_text: "Marshal, all you are guilty of is being gullible and rigid in your ways. I see no reason to condemn you."

traits.locale_text: "Miralay, senin tek suçun saf olman ve yöntemlerinde katı davranmak. Seni kınamak için geçerli bir sebep göremiyorum."
